Class DefaultGuideProjectGenerator

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.guides.core.DefaultGuideProjectGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
GuideProjectGenerator
@Singleton public class DefaultGuideProjectGenerator extends Object implements GuideProjectGenerator
Builder class for constructing SourceBlock instances.

      public void generate(@NonNull @NonNull File outputDirectory, @NonNull @NonNull Guide guide, @NonNull @NonNull GuidesOption guidesOption, @NonNull @NonNull io.micronaut.starter.options.JdkVersion javaVersion) throws IOException

      outputDirectory - the directory where the project files will be generated
      guide - the guide containing the project details
      guidesOption - the guides option containing additional configuration
      javaVersion - the JDK version to be used for the project
